job_history.work_description: Developed and implemented new scheduling system for special events, portfolio reviews and advising through Acuity Scheduling to replace cumbersome phone appointments. Manage front line communication between students, faculty and administration, prepares written communication for prospective and current student admittance. Assist with PR/Marketing with CVPA Academic Affairs and Admissions Offices as well as outreach initiatives.

Manage Center for the Arts internal production calendar. Provide continuous data maintenance/entry in R-25 scheduling system (internal/external performances and scheduled rigging maintenance) to reflect consistency between performance calendars. Rental recaps - track labor hours for FT staff and over-hire.

Identified and conducted market research to provide logistical marketing support to the Artistic Director. Gathered promotional material for summer classes. Developed sponsorship package (included sponsorship letters, levels of sponsorship, sponsorship forms etc.).

Event management for Friends of the Hylton. Provided staff support for annual fundraising event 'Shooting for the Stars'. Responsible for logistics of Friends of the Hylton Center (meetings, special events, catering and marketing materials).

education.university: George Mason University, College of Visual and Performing Arts
New Mexico State University, College of Human Performance

skills.name: Event Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience managing events, including scheduling systems, logistics, and marketing materials, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Developed written communication for students and faculty, and managed front-line communication between students, faculty, and administration, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple projects and tasks, including scheduling systems, data maintenance, and marketing initiatives, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Provided marketing support, including market research, promotional materials, and sponsorship packages, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Management
skills.explanation: Maintained data in scheduling systems, including R-25, showing a solid working proficiency in data management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Provided staff support for events and managed some logistics, but limited experience in leading teams or projects, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Fundraising
skills.explanation: Provided support for fundraising events, but limited experience in leading fundraising efforts or developing fundraising strategies, indicating some practical experience.
